data.name: Scoregasm Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
10 original background music tracks featured in Scoregasm by indie musician John Marwin.

  1. Bigass Gatling Gun
  2. Electronic Evil
  3. Death To All Saturdays
  4. Suicide Via Toilet Cleaning Oatmeals
  5. The Revenge Theme
  6. You Can't Stop Him
  7. Life Is Pain
  8. Tower Of One
  9. Typical Goatrance Song
  10. Dirty Pieces Of Meat
